articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: Blockchain networks Polygon and Fantom suffered a DNS attack Friday that directed users to malicious websites created to steal the keys to their digital wallets.
articles.title: Polygon and Fantom Services Restored After Phishing Attack ￼

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Voyager, a crypto broker, has suspended withdrawals, trading, deposits and loyalty rewards from its app following Three Arrows Capital’s default on its loan.
articles.title: Crypto Broker Voyager Suspends Withdrawals and Trading After 3AC’s Loan Default

articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: FTX, the second-biggest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has signed an option to purchase crypto lender BlockFi for as much as $240M, BlockFi CEO Zac Prince said Friday.
articles.title: FTX Reaches Deal to Acquire BlockFi for Up to $240M as CeFi Lenders Buckle Under Market Pressure

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: Axie Players and Guilds Hope Origin Upgrade Will Revive Beloved Game
articles.title: Axie Infinity Guilds Rush to Aid Players as GameFi Pioneer Craters Axie Players and Guilds Hope Origin Upgrade Will Revive Beloved Game

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Index Issuer Takes on Feds After Bitcoin ETF Denied
articles.title: GBTC Discount Widens to 36% as Legal Fight With SEC Looms
